( NEW YORK)-- Former Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld declares that his biggest regret in office was not convincing George H. W. Bush to accept his resignation after the Abu Ghraib prison scandal, and said the country and the Pentagon probably would've been better off if he had left office in 2004.
